seedGroups.name: Ballistic
seedGroups.description: Ballistic capsules catapult their babies away, up to 30 feet! Search YouTube for “exploding seeds” to see these in action. To harvest: learn the ripening sequence & harvest just before explosion; store in a *sealed* paper bag or mesh bag for a day or two.

species.description: Ballistic. Geranium aka cranesbill looks somewhat like a bird’s long beak with 5 bumps at the bottom. These are 5 “ladles” that turn brown, then spring up to catapult the seeds away, finishing in a chandelier shape. Collect brown bills. Chandeliers no longer contain seed.
